connector.description:
Receive data from AWS Kinesis.

The basic authentication method for the Kinesis service is to specify an access key and a secret key. These parameters are optional because the Kamelet provides a default credentials provider.

If you use the default credentials provider, the Kinesis client loads the credentials through this provider and doesn't use the basic authentication method.

Two headers will be duplicated with different names for clarity at sink level, CamelAwsKinesisPartitionKey will be duplicated into aws.kinesis.partition.key and CamelAwsKinesisSequenceNumber will be duplicated in aws.kinesis.sequence.number

camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-source.stream.name: camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-source.stream
camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-source.stream.description: The Kinesis stream that you want to access. The Kinesis stream that you specify must already exist.

camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-source.accessK.name: camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-source.accessKey
camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-source.accessK.description: The access key obtained from AWS.

camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-source.secretK.name: camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-source.secretKey
camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-source.secretK.description: The secret key obtained from AWS.

camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-source.useDefa.name: camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-source.useDefaultCredentialsProvider
camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-source.useDefa.description: If true, the Kinesis client loads credentials through a default credentials provider. If false, it uses the basic authentication method (access key and secret key).

camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-source.uriEndp.name: camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-source.uriEndpointOverride
camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-source.uriEndp.description: The overriding endpoint URI. To use this option, you must also select the `overrideEndpoint` option.

camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-source.overrid.name: camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-source.overrideEndpoint
camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-source.overrid.description: Select this option to override the endpoint URI. To use this option, you must also provide a URI for the `uriEndpointOverride` option.

camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-source.delay.name: camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-source.delay
camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-source.delay.description: The number of milliseconds before the next poll of the selected stream.
